about_the_game:
It's time to unleash the Monsters & Icons!



Complete your collection and show off your style!
This pack of ten characters can be used in either single-player or multiplayer modes.

Pack includes:
005. Drool the Zombie
016. Griff the Goblin King
097. Straw the nasty Scarecrow
175. Rip the unfortunate Skeleton
046. Saber the lethal Japanese Warrior
151. Hai the beautiful Japanese Geisha
195. Whisper the wild Western Woman
070. Nate the cunning thief
176. Cross the bloodthirsty Nun
090. Eugene the Doctor of the Universe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX / AMD R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Monsters & Icons character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
